H0.text: leader of carthage in the first punic war. Hanno the Great

H1.text: leader of carthage in the first punic war. Hamilcar Barca

H2.text: leader of carthage in the first punic war. Hasdrubal the Fair

H3.text: leader of carthage in the first punic war. Xanthippus

A4.text: Hanno I the Great lived in the 4th century BC

A5.text: Hamilcar is thought to be the best commander of the First Punic War

A6.text: Hamilcar commanded the Carthaginian land forces in Sicily from 247 BC to 241 BC, during the latter stages of the First Punic War
